author: per curiam
text:
547 U. S. ____ (2006)547 U. S. ____ (2006)547 U. S. ____ (2006)SUPREME COURT OF THE UNITED STATESMOHAWK INDUSTRIES, INC., PETITIONERv.SHIRLEY WILLIAMS et al.on writ of certiorari to the united states court of
appeals for the eleventh circuit[June 5, 2006]Per Curiam.The writ of certiorari limited to
Question 1 presented by the petition, granted at 546 U. S. ___
(2005), is dismissed as improvidently granted. The petition for a
writ of certiorari is granted. The judgment is vacated, and the
case is remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the
Eleventh Circuit for further consideration in light ofAnzav.Ideal Steel Supply Corp.,ante,p. ___.It is so ordered.
